bug.author: intvo(ghost)
bug.summary: Can't download COCO annotation file after labeling 1k images
bug.description: When i try to download the annotation file, it failed ( failed - network error ) Please take a look at this issue as soon as possible. Thank you

comments.comment: Is this solved? I'm having the same issue at v0.10.5.

When I download the COCO file for a dataset that has 928 images I get a Download Failedmessage in chrome. I can download the COCO file for smaller datasets The request status code is 200 and I get a well formed JSON in the body, I think all the annotations are there. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14118472/58436240-bd414100-809a-11e9-91eb-65d09bb8e2ec.png></denchmark-link>
I managed to download the file using curl.
